signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper above(final int codePoint)
name: above
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a Unicode escaper that escapes all characters with code points greater than the specified value.
 *
 * @param codePoint the maximum code point to escape
 * @return a Unicode escaper that escapes all characters with code points greater than the specified value
 */

signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper below(final int codePoint)
name: below
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns a Unicode escaper that will escape all characters with code points
 * less than or equal to the specified value.
 *
 * @param codePoint the maximum code point to be escaped (inclusive)
 * @return a new Unicode escaper instance
 */

signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper between(final int codePointLow, final int codePointHigh)
name: between
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a Unicode escaper that escapes all Unicode characters in the range 
 * [codePointLow, codePointHigh].
 *
 * @param codePointLow The low end of the Unicode character range (inclusive).
 * @param codePointHigh The high end of the Unicode character range (inclusive).
 * @return A new instance of JavaUnicodeEscaper.
 */

signature: public static JavaUnicodeEscaper outsideOf(final int codePointLow, final int codePointHigh)
name: outsideOf
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a new instance of {@link JavaUnicodeEscaper} that escapes Unicode characters
 * in the range [codePointLow, codePointHigh).
 *
 * @param codePointLow the low end of the Unicode character range (inclusive)
 * @param codePointHigh the high end of the Unicode character range (exclusive)
 * @return a new instance of {@link JavaUnicodeEscaper}
 */

name: toUtf16Escape
javadoc:
/**
 * Escapes a Unicode code point as a UTF-16 surrogate pair in the format of "\\uXXXX\\uYYYY".
 *
 * @param codePoint the Unicode code point to escape
 * @return the escaped UTF-16 surrogate pair
 */
